name: Lucid Nightmare Program
description:
A new project that promisses to treat your traumas while you sleep in a "controlled" environment.

SEIZURE WARNING: This game contains bright flashing lights.

Lucid Nightmare Program is the 1st project that i've worked from start to finish. What started as a 1 week due perlin noise homework for my game design class ended up as a 1 month personal project for the sole reason being that i loved the feel it gave me, it reminded me of Intelligent Cube, a PS1 game that i like a lot, and as i played with unity and learned tons of features with it, i think i managed to mimic that eerie feel and i'm very happy with how it turned out.

Audio made with FL Studio and altered sounds from freesound.org with Audacity
Tile texture taken from https://3dtextures.me/
